To:- C.I.G.S., War Office* 0.135c December 18thuTo-day the 4th Italian /*rmy were heavily attacked and lost Mt. Asolone which is a very important pointsI visited.the 4th Army H.C, and to-night fresh troops are being sent up.Under the constant attacks those engaged are certainly weakenings
